overview:
Leland Zimmerman, VP Marketing, Limos.com

Leland Zimmerman joined Limos.com in July 2010. A member of the Hotwire start-up team, Mr. Zimmerman has a 10-year career in consumer online marketing. He was previously Marketing Manager at Levi Strauss, and Senior Product Manager at NexTag, the leading comparison shopping site. He holds a BS from USC.
